// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// no Input

// Output signature:
//
// Name                 Index   Mask Register SysValue  Format   Used
// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// no Output
cs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[175], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[34], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb2[11], immediateIndexed
dcl_uav_typed_texture3d (float,float,float,float) u0
dcl_input vThreadID.xyz
dcl_temps 3
dcl_thread_group 8, 8, 1

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

ult r0.xy, vThreadID.xyxx, cb1[28].xyxx
and r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
if_nz r0.x
  utof r0.xyzw, vThreadID.xyzz
  add r0.xyzw, r0.xyzw, l(0.500000, 0.500000, 0.500000, -0.500000)
  utof r1.xy, cb1[28].xyxx
  div r0.xy, r0.xyxx, r1.xyxx

// VFViewDirReconstruction adjustement (sun/moon volumetric fog) inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-volumetric-fog -i -f --only-autofixed 90b7606ceedd2123-cs.txt

add r0.x, r0.x, -r2.x

  mad r0.xy, r0.xyxx, l(2.000000, 2.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000), l(-1.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
  mul r0.xy, r0.xyxx, cb1[27].xyxx
  mul r0.y, r0.y, l(-1.000000)
  mul r1.xyz, r0.yyyy, cb1[32].xyzx
  mad r1.xyz, r0.xxxx, cb1[31].xyzx, r1.xyzx
  add r1.xyz, r1.xyzx, cb1[33].xyzx
  mul r0.xy, r0.zwzz, l(0.031250, 0.031250, 0.000000, 0.000000)
  exp r0.xy, r0.xyxx
  mad r0.xy, r0.xyxx, cb1[1].zzzz, cb1[1].wwww
  add r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
  mul r0.x, r0.x, l(0.500000)
  mul r0.zw, r0.xxxx, r1.xxxy
  mad r0.x, r1.z, r0.x, cb0[174].z
  add r1.x, r0.x, -cb1[5].x
  div_sat r1.x, r1.x, -cb1[5].y
  add r1.x, -r1.x, l(1.000000)
  mul r1.x, r1.x, cb1[8].z
  mul r1.x, r1.x, cb1[5].z
  dp2 r0.z, r0.zwzz, r0.zwzz
  sqrt r0.z, r0.z
  mad_sat r0.z, cb2[10].x, r0.z, cb2[10].y
  add r0.x, r0.x, -cb1[4].x
  div_sat r0.x, r0.x, cb1[4].y
  add r0.x, -r0.x, l(1.000000)
  mul r0.x, r0.x, cb1[8].z
  mul r0.x, r0.x, cb1[4].z
  mad r0.x, r1.x, r0.z, r0.x
  mad_sat r0.y, r0.y, cb1[3].x, cb1[3].y
  mul r0.xzw, r0.yyyy, r0.xxxx
  mov r0.y, l(0)
  store_uav_typed u0.xyzw, vThreadID.xyzz, r0.xyzw
endif 
ret 
// Approximately 40 instruction slots used
